title: New: Jungle Fires – Hold
content:
Brooklyn’s Jungle Fires (Kaia and Menashé David Israel) ooze cool.

Their debut track (although there appears to have been some form of reinvention along the way), Hold, manages to be soulful and sensual, whilst remaining on the right side of slick pop music – we’re talking big choruses and a booming vocal line. Check out Hold below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
